name: tails-offline-crypto-helpers
description: A collection of misc scripts and html files for use in tails offline

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos
scripts.build:linux: bun build index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64-baseline --outfile dist/tails-offline-crypto-helpers-linux && chmod +x dist/tails-offline-crypto-helpers
scripts.build:macos: bun build index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64-baseline --outfile dist/tails-offline-crypto-helpers-macos && chmod +x dist/macos-offline-crypto-helpers
